project_details.title: Computer Science Ecosystems Group Project
project_details.description: This project aims to equip foundation students with practical skills in Front-End Web Development, document typesetting, and data management.

deliverable.name: HTML Webpage
deliverable.description: A basic HTML webpage featuring a form with CSS styling.HTML webpage features a form that allows users to input data, which is then processed and displayed using JavaScript. We used CSS to style the webpage, making it visually appealing and easy to use.

deliverable.name: CSS Stylesheet
deliverable.description: A CSS stylesheet that provides responsive design for the HTML webpage

deliverable.name: JavaScript Functionality
deliverable.description: JavaScript code that handles data submissions using the Fetch API.developed functionality using the JavaScript Fetch API to handle data submissions, emphasizing collaborative coding and problem-solving. This allowed us to create a dynamic and interactive webpage that responds to user input.

deliverable.name: LaTeX Document
deliverable.description: A LaTeX document that details the project's scope and findings.document was created as a team, detailing the project's scope and findings. We prepared the document with input from all team members, ensuring each section reflects the collaborative effort and understanding of the content.

deliverable.name: XML Document
deliverable.description: An XML document that represents structured data in a detailed and organized manner
